name: autocomplete-search
description: A simple javascript regex-based client-side autocomplete search tool.

scripts.build-css: node-sass src -o dist; postcss dist/autosearch.css --use autoprefixer -d dist/; minify dist/autosearch.css > dist/autosearch.min.css
scripts.build-js: babel src/autosearch.js -d dist/; cat src/helpers/polyfill.min.js dist/autosearch.js > dist/pautosearch.min.js; minify dist/pautosearch.min.js > dist/autosearch.min.js; rm dist/pautosearch.min.js

author: John C. Kealy
